author: dlr
msg: Added useful DB2/400 hack uncovered by Scott Weaver
<Sweaver@rippe.com>.  Scott indicates that DB2/400 is practically a
different product than vanilla DB2 (but since we have no DB2/400
templates yet his info can live in here for now).

author: dlr
msg: Rolling back change.  Jason would like ~/build.properties to override
everything "because it's used for global values used everywhere."

author: dlr
msg: User specified per-project properties should override user defaults.

author: dlr
msg: Torque.setConfiguration().  If Torque's configuration isn't already
set, setting DBFactory's configuration to Torque's null configuration
isn't going to do a whole lotta good.
